flappyBird.descriptions: Flappy Bird: A bird is flying in the sky and player needs to help it dodge stationary obstacles

data.descriptions: This should represent something or someone the main character needs to avoid in the game environment, this obstacle is something that is preferably in the sky and would replace the top pipe

wackaMole.descriptions: Whack a mole: A mole pops out of random locations at random times and user have to catch or hit it

hajmola.descriptions: A main element gets bigger on tap and few more elemets around it float. the main element needs to save itself from other elemets or else it will get smaller on touching the floating elements.

data.descriptions: the main element which grows big on tap

Basketball.descriptions: A basketball to be thrown into a basket on swipe. Single player aiming game with projectile motion of a ball.

data.descriptions: main ball to be shot

Savethecow.descriptions: An item falls from top and the user tilts the phone to control the main character. The main character tries to sve the falling item. if the item falls the character looses a life.

Jumpyball.descriptions: An item jumps from ground to top and lands on bridges in between. The bridges come from both side and can destroy the main item if it fails to jump on time. The game continues untill the main item is destroyed.

data.descriptions: background image
the item that jumps
platform on which the item lands.
